Package ohos.distributedhardware.devicemanager

Provides interfaces and classes for distributed hardware management, including querying information about local and trusted devices, subscribing to device online and offline notifications, and presenting devices on the UI for the user to select.
Since:
4
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeviceManager.DeviceManagerCallback
    Provides callbacks for getting DeviceManager instance.
    DeviceStateCallback
    Provides callbacks that can be invoked when the state of a monitored device changes to online or offline.
    ReturnCode
    Defines the return codes for operations related to device management.
    SelectDeviceListListener
    Provides callbacks that can be invoked when a device is selected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DeviceInfo
    Provides basic information about a device, including the network ID, name, and type.
    DeviceManager
    Provides methods for managing devices, including the methods for querying information about local and trusted devices, subscribing to device online and offline notifications, and obtaining devices selected by users.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DeviceInfo.DeviceType
    Enumerates types of a device.
